channel.title: Press Release on Oliver Clark's New Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Press Release on Oliver Clark's New Blog

item.title: Press_Releases.Rmd
item.description: Hi - just a quick note on academic posters at conferences. I have seen that a few posters have received some media attention this week. In the only one that I’ve had a close look at the analysis was very tenuous and the conclusion seemed to rely on the lack of significant effect in a t-test which follows the denial of the antecedent fallacy. There were other issues, like bar graphs being presented that started from a non-zero integer, and various methodological issues that (I hope) would have been desk rejected or raised by reviewers.
